screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .mpc file in VideoLAN VLC media player 3
screenshot.caption: MPC file open in VideoLAN VLC media player 3

description: MPC files are uncommon since they are only packaged with PlayStation 2 games. You will most likely only encounter them if you dump the resource files from a game onto your computer or if someone shares an MPC video with you that was dumped from a game.
NOTE: .MAD video files are also utilized in various Electronic Arts video games for PlayStation 2.

images.caption: MPC file open in VideoLAN VLC media player 3
